entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 10.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries or rain showers after midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
